list.name: Changes
list.comment: Everything is done and works fine, this is the last version of the project if I don't decide to make little changes

task.summary: 3 classes and their constructors has been added.
Player calsses, LinkedList and Node classes Main Class(Game) and some necessary constructors and methods has been added.
Player calsses, LinkedList and Node classes Main Class(Game) and some necessary constructors and methods has been added.
I found separate player classes unnecessary so i deleted other 2 player classes many functions has been added to game class(main) and player class.
An unnecessary method has been deleted from Cards class and the deck has been created.

Instead of shuffling cards in Deck class then adding them into hands in Hand class, both work is now being done in a single method in the Hand Class and working properly. Other than that TakeBids function in game class has been moved to Payer class and all the objects except CardsOnTable has been created with appropriate parameters in the Game class.

Instead of shuffling cards in Deck class then adding them into hands in Hand class, both work is now being done in a single method in the Hand Class and working properly. Other than that TakeBids function in game class has been moved to Payer class and all the objects except CardsOnTable has been created with appropriate parameters in the Game class.

Instead of having the Game class as main another main class has been created since there are many functions in Game class and they require many parameters in main case. Displaying all player's hand has been added.

Bot's logic is done and works properly. player can play a card from his/her hand by typing the card's name but can play any card from his/her hand so player logic hasn't completely done yet game loops works and it can find the greatest card on table after everyone played.

Bot's logic is done and works properly. player can play a card from his/her hand by typing the card's name but can play any card from his/her hand so player logic hasn't completely done yet game loops works and it can find the greatest card on table after everyone played.
Everything except arranging points and some exceptions has been done and work properly.
Everything except arranging points and some exceptions has been done and work properly.
Everything is done and works fine, this is the last version of the project if I don't decide to make little changes
